incompatibleBrowser.title: Incompatible browser
incompatibleBrowser.body: Your browser does not support the technologies required for the app to work. You can still try to use the app, but it's not guaranteed it'll work.

emptyNetwork.title: Nobody is connected to your network.
emptyNetwork.body: Open this website elsewhere to connect.

tile: Click on this area to start a transfer.

emptyChat.title: It's empty in here.
emptyChat.body: Start chatting with others in your room.

connect: Open this page on your other device to copy files:
desktopHint: Press Ctrl+V to send your clipboard contents.

reasons.cryptoRequired: This instance requires WebCrypto. Possible reasons for failure: your connection is not over HTTPS or your web browser does not support WebCrypto.

network.networkFull: The network you have selected is full, please select a different network.

secure: This instance ensures all data (file metadata, previews, chat) is encrypted between peers.
insecure: This instance allows for unencrypted data exchange. The owners of this instance may see the data (file metadata, previews, chat) sent between peers. File transfers are still encrypted.
